entry.title: Persistent Log Level in Admin Studio

link.title: Persistent Log Level in Admin Studio

entry.content:
Now you can change log level per category (set of loggers) in Admin Studio. No more setting multiple loggers on multiple nodes to debug your REST connector, yay! That setting will be persisted across restarts. It isn’t affected by old school reset all loggers to default button:

You can see details of what exact loggers are included in the Dev Studio. Also you can create your own:

Available since 8.4:

https://docs.pega.com/system-administration/87/managing-log-categories
